info.titleen: I’m going to take the yoga class.

sentense.en: Mina, will you attend any after-school programs?
sentense.ko: 미나야, 너 방과 후 프로그램에 참석할 거니?

sentense.en: Sure. I’m going to take the yoga class.
sentense.ko: 그럼. 나 요가 수업을 들을 거야.

sentense.en: Really? Me, too. When should I sign up?
sentense.ko: 정말? 나도 그래. 내가 언제 등록해야 하니?

sentense.en: Sign up starts at 4 o’clock this afternoon.
Thanks. When does the yoga class start?
It begins at 4:30 p.m. every Friday.
